document.full_text: dave zabriskie rode to a dominating individual time trial victory and three-time race winner levi leipheimer was second to cut teammate chris horner's overall lead to 38 seconds friday after the sixth stage of the tour of california.
document.title: leipheimer cuts horner lead in tour of california
lines_and_colors: dave zabriskie rode to a dominating individual time trial victory and three-time race winner levi leipheimer was second to cut teammate chris horner's overall lead to 38 seconds friday after the sixth stage of the tour of california.
